name: The brAIn (Beanie Bongle)
description:
Welcome to brAIn, a game where you must repair your broken AI before the facility you're in crumbles. (this is a small game that was made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0.)

--Disclaimer--

This is my first Game Jam and I am quite new to game dev, the game might be a little hard, but I recommend taking a look at the tutorial below and also reading the notes on the far right which tell you which Tools to use for what Control Panel before playing!

--How to Play--

Your objective is to reboot the brAIn using (clicking and holding) the reboots on the reboot panel (on the left of the work station in front of you) before the brAIns Stability Bar reaches 0, you must also repair the broken down Control Panels (that are directly in front of you) by dragging and dropping the right tool onto the right Control Panel, otherwise they will drain the brAIns Stability Bar. The notes on the far right tell you which Tools to use for which Control Panel, If the brAIns Stability Bar (the bar on the top of the work station) reach 0 before you reboot the brAIn then.. well maybe it's best you not know.

--Credits--

All Sprites, Code and the background Music were made by me during the Game Jam.
